data.name: HTTP Input
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="{{protocol}}://{{hostname}}:{{port}}{{path}}{{querystring query_params extra_query_params}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
